entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow Shower and Blowing Snow, -5.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 10:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow Shower and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -5.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -8.2°C
Wind: NW 24 km/h gust 44 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow this morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the morning. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
